alert.note: Alert for Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 6:44PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BIG HORN...POWDER RIVER... SOUTHERN ROSEBUD AND EASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM MDT... At 643 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 13 miles east of Ashland to 7 miles northwest of Fort Phil Kearny Historical Site. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. There is an outflow producing strong winds that has no thunderstorms associated with it. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Broadus, Big Horn, Clearmont, Leiter, Banner, Moorhead, Olive, Arvada, Otter, Sonnette, Story, and Ucross. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
